name: Duck Merglings
description:
This game is a infinite runner where you play as a duck that wants to try and save all of her ducklings.

Objective

Collect ducklings and place them in the green spheres.
Don't place them inside the red spheres.

Controls 

WASD - Move

Team:
Vitomir Hardi - https://lolster24-vitomir-h.itch.io/

Matej Jelić - https://krugisa.itch.io/
